PHRASE.LANG: Awarded to pilots that have proven their worth and reached the halfway stage of the Sodium Salt Shooter.
Récompense décernée aux pilotes qui ont prouvé leur valeur et ont atteint l'étape de mi-parcours de Sodium Salt Shooter
Wird an Piloten vergeben, die sich als würdig erwiesen und die erste Hälfte beim Sodium Salt Shooter hinter sich gebracht haben
Assegnato ai piloti che hanno dimostrato il proprio valore raggiungendo il livello intermedio di Sodium Salt Shooter
Otorgado a los pilotos que hayan demostrado su valía y hayan alcanzado el nivel intermedio de Sodium Salt Shooter
実力を証明し、Sodium Salt Shooter のステージ半分を攻略したパイロットへの賞。
자신의 가치를 입증하고, Sodium Salt Shooter의 중간 단계까지 도달한 파일럿들에게 수여합니다.
Awarded to pilots that have proven their worth and reached the halfway stage of the Sodium Salt Shooter.
授予能證明其價值並到達 Sodium Salt Shooter 中級程度的飛行員。
授予能證明其價值並到達 Sodium Salt Shooter 中級程度的飛行員。
Awarded to pilots that have proven their worth and reached the halfway stage of the Sodium Salt Shooter.
